intro: Gunniopsis intermedia, commonly known as the slender gunniopsis, is a flowering plant native to the arid regions of central Australia. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its slender, upright stems and small, tubular flowers. The plant typically grows in sandy or rocky soils and is adapted to survive in harsh, dry conditions. Its flowers are usually pale blue or purple and bloom during the cooler months. Gunniopsis intermedia is a low-growing perennial that plays a role in stabilizing soil in its native habitat.
